recipe.title: Aaloo Paratha
recipe.description: This is an easy stuffed bread served with curd and indian pickle.

preparation.li: For the stuffing, take 2 medium boiled potatos, 1/2 tsp ginger chopped
Add the salt as per taste to the stuffing
Add the crushed red pepper, coriander leaves and 2 tsp oil
In a large bowl, combine wheat flour, water and salt. Kneed it in to a smooth dough
Heat a skillet, side by side tale a tenis ball size of dough, flatten it a bit and put 1 tbsp of the potato mixture and then roll it to a flat bread of arounf 5inches diameter.
Grill it on a midium high heat, greace it with oil on both the sides and grill it for 1-2 mins and its ready to serve

recipe.title: Beetroot Raita
recipe.description: This is an easy cooling side dish well accompanied with other spicy dishs.

preparation.li: Take the below ingredients and temper it
1/2 tsp cumin seeds 1
1/2 tsp ginger chopped 2
1/2 tsp oil
In a large bowl, combine yogurt, beetroot puree and salt
Heat oil in a pan and add cumin and ginger once its hot
Add the tempering to yogurt and its ready to serve

recipe.title: Cauliflower Curry
recipe.description: This is an easy side dish well accompanied with rice or roti.

preparation.li: In a large wok, add oil, let it heat and then add all the spices
Add chopped onion and potatos and cauliflower
Cover the lid and let it cook for 10-15mins and its ready to serve

recipe.title: Cauliflower Paratha
recipe.description: This paratha is a wholesome meal best served with Raita

ingredient.li: For filling of the paratha add 1/2 cup grated cauliflower and 1 inch ginger

preparation.li: Kneed the dough and let it rest for 5-10 mins
Mix grated gauliflower and grated ginger, add salt to taste.
Take a tennis ball size of dough, flatten it a bit and fill a tbsp of cauliflower filling, seal it and roll it with the help of a rolling pin, like a roti/naan
Grill it on a midium high heat, greace it with oil on both the sides and grill it for 1-2 mins and its ready to serve

recipe.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipe.description: This is an easy recipe for Chicken Tikka Masala--chicken marinated in yogurt and spices and then served in a tomato cream sauce. Serve with rice or warm naan bread.

ingredient.li: 3 boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-size pieces 7
For making gravy we need add the following ingredients

preparation.li: In a large bowl, combine yogurt, lemon juice, 2 teaspoons cumin, cinnamon, cayenne, black pepper, ginger, and salt. Stir in chicken, cover, and refrigerate for 1 hour.
Preheat a grill for high heat.
Lightly oil the grill grate. Thread chicken onto skewers, and discard marinade. Grill until juices run clear, about 5 minutes on each side.

Melt butter in a large heavy skillet over medium heat. Saute garlic and jalapeno for 1 minute. Season with 2 teaspoons cumin, paprika, and 3 teaspoons salt. Stir in tomato sauce and cream. Simmer on low heat until sauce thickens, about 20 minutes. Add grilled chicken, and simmer for 10 minutes. Transfer to a serving platter, and garnish with fresh cilantro.

recipe.title: Cucumber Raita
recipe.description: This is an easyccooling side dish well accompanied with other spicy dishs.

preparation.li: In a large bowl, combine yogurt, grated cucumber, mint leaves and salt, mix well and the raita is ready to serve

recipe.title: Daal Fry
recipe.description: This is an easy lentil soup well accompanied with steamed rice.

ingredient.li: For tempering add 1/2 tsp cumin seeds, 1 clove garlic and 1/2 tbsp oil

preparation.li: In a pressure cooker add daal, water, salt and turmuric. cook untill 3-5 whistles.
Heat oil in a pan and add cumin and chopped garlic once its hot
Add the tempering to boiled daal and its ready to serve

recipe.title: Phodnicha Bhaat
recipe.description: This is an easy twist to steamed rice.

preparation.li: You need is some boiled rice, onions and chilli powder.
Add rice to the cumin seeds, mustard and chilli powder, add some salt.

recipe.title: Jeera rice
recipe.description: Jeera rice as in cumin rice is an easy twist to plain steamed rice to enahance its flavor profile.

preparation.li: In a deep pan, put oil,let it heat, once oil is hot add cumin seeds and let it crackel.
Add rice and stir fry it to develope the nutty flavors
Add water and salt and cover the lid until rice is cooked completely and its ready to serve

recipe.title: Kadhai Paneer
recipe.description: Kadhai Paneer is a main dish served best with naan

ingredient.li: 1 onion, 1 clove of garlic and 1/2 inch ginger all pureed together
For tempering add the following below ingredients
1/2 tsp cumin seeds, 1/2 tsp fennel seeds, 1/2 tsp coriander seeds, 1 clove and 2 small green cardmom1
250 gms of Paneer cut in to cubes

preparation.li: In a wok, add oil, once its hot add onion garlic and ginger paste, fry until oil seperates and then add tomato puree and cook for 10 more mins and gravy is ready
Dry roast cumin seeds, fennel seeds, coriander seeds, clove and cardmom and then grind it in to a coarse spice powder
Heat butter in a pan and add onion and capsicum once its hot, add the spice powder and fry for 1-2mins.
Add the cooked gravy and Paneer cubes and cook for 3-5 mins and its ready to serve

recipe.title: Methi Paratha
recipe.description: This paratha is a wholesome meal best served with Raita

ingredient.li: For filling of the paratha add 1/2 cup fenugreek leaves chopped, 1 inch ginger and 1 chopped green chilly

preparation.li: Kneed the dough and let it rest for 5-10 mins
Mix fenugreek leaves, chopped green chilly and grated ginger, add salt to taste.
Take a tennis ball size of dough, flatten it a bit and fill a tbsp of fenugreek filling, seal it and roll it with the help of a rolling pin, like a roti/naan
Grill it on a midium high heat, greace it with oil on both the sides and grill it for 1-2 mins and its ready to serve

recipe.title: Palak Paneer
recipe.description: Palak Paneer is a main dish served best with naan/ steamed rice

ingredient.li: 1/2 onion, 1 clove of garlic and 1/2 inch ginger all pureed together
For tempering add 1/2 tsp cumin seeds, 1 bay leaf, 1 inch cinnamon stick, 250 gms of Paneer cut in to cubes

preparation.li: In a wok, add oil, once its hot add cumin, bay leaf and cinnamon stick and fry for 1 min.
Add onion garlic and ginger paste, fry until oil seperates and then add tomato puree and cook for 10 more mins and then add spinach puree and cook for 3-5 mins.
Add paneer cubes and cook for 2-3 mins and palak paneer is ready to serve

recipe.title: Paneer butter Masala
recipe.description: Paneer butter masala is a main dish served best with naan.

ingredient.li: 1 onion, 1 clove of garlic and 1/2 inch ginger all pureed together
250 gms of Paneer cut in to cubes

preparation.li: In a wok, add oil, once its hot add onion garlic and ginger paste, fry until oil seperates and then add tomato puree and cook for 10 more mins and gravy is ready
Dry roast cumin seeds, fennel seeds, coriander seeds, clove and cardmom and then grind it in to a coarse spice powder
Heat butter in a pan and add the cooked gravy and Paneer cubes, add cream and cook for 3-5 mins and its ready to serve

recipe.title: Pinapple Raita
recipe.description: This is an easy cooling side dish well accompanied with other spicy dishes

ingredient.li: 1 can of pineapple chunks or fresh pineapple cut in to small cubes

preparation.li: In a large bowl, combine yogurt, pineapple chunks, mint leaves and salt, mix well and the raita is ready to serve

recipe.title: Potato curry
recipe.description: This is an easy side dish well accompanied with rice or roti.

preparation.li: In a large wok, add oil, let it heat and then add all the spices
Add chopped onion and potatos
Cover the lid and let it cook for 10-15mins and its ready to serve

recipe.title: Spinach Raita
recipe.description: This is an easy cooling side dish well accompanied with other spicy dishes.

ingredient.li: For tempering add 1/2 tsp cumin seeds, 1/2 tsp ginger chopped and 1/2 tsp oil

preparation.li: In a large bowl, combine yogurt, spinach puree and salt
Heat oil in a pan and add cumin and ginger once its hot
Add the tempering to yogurt mixture and its ready to serve

recipe.title: Moong Usal
recipe.description: For people who are on a diet, this is the perfect food to carry for lunch.Sprouts are healthy and are also rich in proteins.

preparation.li: Heat oil in a pan, add mustard, turmeric powder and curry leaves to it.
Add the sprout moong, salt, red chilli powder, and water.
Mix well, cover and cook on a low flame for five minutes and it's ready.

recipe.title: Methi Pakoras
recipe.description: A starter specially famous during rainy season.

preparation.li: Mix methi leaves, besan, rice flour, ginger, finely chopped green chilli, onions, curd, cooking soda, red chilli powder and ajwain in a bowl.
Add water gradually, and make it a thick batter.
Heat oil in a wok and drop the battered pakora one at a time.
Deep fry till they turn golden.

recipe.title: Chickpea Pulav
recipe.description: A one-pot meal with ideal combination of protein and carbohydrates.

preparation.li: Wash and soak the rice in about 2 cups of water at least for 10 minutes.
Drain the liquid out of the can of chickpeas and wash the chickpeas well.
Heat the oil in a saucepan. Test the heat by adding one cumin seed to the oil; if seed cracks right away oil is ready.
Add cumin seeds as seeds crack add the ginger, green chili, and turmeric stir for few seconds.
Add chickpeas and potatoes after it comes to boil cover the pen and let it cook for about 8 minutes over medium low heat.
Add rice, spinach, bell pepper and water. Mix and bring it to boil. Cover the pan and let it cook for about 12-15 minutes over low heat.
When Pulav is ready add garam masala mix gently.

recipe.title: Cheela
recipe.description: A hardy and Savery indian breakfast dish

preparation.li: You need to take besan, wheat flour, onions, garlic pods, salt, coriander, green chillies and red chilly powder in a bowl and add water to make a paste.
Heat oil in a pan, and pour the batter on the pan.
Fry till they turn brown.

recipe.title: Egg Bhurjee
recipe.description: An indian twist to scrambled eggs, best served with bread or roti.

preparation.li: Heat up pan for 2 minute.
Cumin,chopped onions, green chillies and curry leaves in oil and add eggs or paneer.
Add Salt to taste and heat up this mixture for 5 min.
Serve with Bread.

recipe.title: Anda Curry
recipe.description: Fried eggs dipped in spicy gravy well served with steamed rice.

preparation.li: Just heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a saucepan and add chopped onions, garlic and ginger paste.
Sauté for a few minutes until the onions change colour.
Once the onions are fried, add some turmeric powder, garam masala powder, coriander powder and red chilli powder. Stir it well.
Now add the tomato puree, salt and boiled eggs.
Boil the curry for 10 to 15 minutes until you see the eggs are coated well with the curry.

recipe.title: Anardana Raita
recipe.description: sweet and sour Side Dish

preparation.li: Just whisk the yogurt to make it creamy, add a pinch of salt and some red chilli powder.
Add the pomegranate juice and the seeds to yogurt mix.

recipe.title: Aloo Kurkure
recipe.description: Spicy and crunchy snack good with tea.

preparation.li: Combine potatoes, mint leaves, green chillies, cumin seeds powder, lemon juice and salt in a bowl and mix well.
Shape the mixture into round balls and keep them aside. Take some plain flour in a different wok, add little water to make a thick and smooth paste and keep aside.
Dip each potato ball in the flour paste and then roll in powdered rice flakes till they are evenly coated from all the sides.
Heat oil in another kadhai and deep-fry the potato balls a few at a time till they are golden brown in colour.

recipe.title: Achaari Paneer
recipe.description: This is a Main Dish well accompamied by naan

preparation.li: Take a bowl and mix fennel seeds, mustard seeds, fenugreek seeds, cumin seeds and asafoetida.
Heat oil in another pan and add the seed mixture. When they crackle, add onions and saute till the onions turn pink.
Add the paneer, turmeric, chilli powder, black salt and stir for some time.
Later, add coriander and salt and bring to a boil.

recipe.title: Date Nut Ladoo
recipe.description: Vegan date nut balls

preparation.li: Remove seeds and grind the dates to a coarse paste. Set aside.
Dry roast the nuts one kind at a time until they start to brown in patches.
Pulse this in a mixie or food processor until you have a coarse mixture. It’s best to leave a few chunky pieces for some texture in the ladoos.
Heat the butter or ghee in a non-stick pan.
Add the chopped nuts,dates and blend in.
When it's cool enough to handle, make ladoos of your desired size and roll in the desiccated coconut.

recipe.title: Sandesh
recipe.description: Sandesh, an easy Bengali milk sweet using fresh chenna.

ingredient.li: A small pinch of cardamom powder

preparation.li: Soak the saffron strands in the warm milk.
Once you have made the chenna and kneaded it to a smooth-ish consistency, add the sugar, salt and cardamom powder to it.
Transfer to a pan and cook on low heat to remove the rawness of the chenna.
Keep stirring until it starts to leave the sides of the pan.
Transfer to a bowl and add the saffron and milk.
When the mixture is warm, shape into small balls, and flatten lightly.

recipe.title: Chocolate Peda
recipe.description: Chocolate peda recipe with condensed milk and milk powder.

preparation.li: Heat a non-stick pan and add the butter, condensed milk, milk powder, chocolate chips.
Continue to keep the flame low. Mix the ingredients gently together.
Once the mixture is super thick , take out in a bowl.
And make flat round balls.

recipe.title: Kaju Katli
recipe.description: Cashew Barfi

ingredient.li: 1 cup of raw grinded cashew nuts

preparation.li: Add the water and sugar to a non-stick pan and keep on medium flame.
Add the cashew powder to the sugar syrup and keep stirring till mixture get thick.
Transfer to mixture to a butter paper and using a rolling pin roll the mixture to 1/4" thickness.
Using knife cut out the desired shape.

recipe.title: Besan Ladoo
recipe.description: Besan Ladoo

preparation.li: Heat ghee in a pan over low heat then add besan flour.
After 5 min turn of heat and add milk, almonds, sugar, raisin, cardamom powder.
When its warm enough to handle, shape into lime-sized balls.

recipe.title: Paneer Kheer
recipe.description: Paneer Payasam

preparation.li: In a pan, bring the milk to boil on low heat.
Add the condensed milk, powdered cardamom and crumble paneer.
Now take out this mixture to bowls and on top of that add pistachios and saffron.

recipe.title: Apple Kheer
recipe.description: Indian apple pudding

preparation.li: Bring the milk to boil in a pan and meanwhile, in a smaller pan add ghee, almonds and apples and cook for 3-4 mins.
Now in milk add saffron, condensed milk and cooked apple-almond mixture.
Mix well and turn off the flame.

recipe.title: Choco Khoya Kalakand
recipe.description: It is a double layered kalakand sweet.

preparation.li: Mix the cocoa powder and milk to form a thick paste and in a pan add khoya and sugar on low flame.
Now in khoya and sugar mixture take out on a plate and on top of that add chocolate mixture firmly.
And add chopped nuts for garnish.

recipe.title: Mushroom Fry
recipe.description: This is an easy side dish well accompanied with any rice/roti

preparation.li: Chop the mushrooms vertically into thin slices to retain the mushroom shape.
When the mustard seeds pop, add the sliced onions, green chilies and chopped garlic. Sauté until the onions turn translucent.
Next add the mushrooms and fry on medium flame for about 6 minutes or until all the moisture from the mushrooms dries up.
Now add salt, red chilly powder, black pepper powder, turmeric powder and garam masala.
Fry everything for another 2-4 minutes till the mushroom pieces are nicely browned.
Switch off and take it in a serving dish. Garnish with coriander leaves and a piece of lemon.
Mushroom chili fry or mushroom pepper fry is ready to serve.

recipe.title: Besan Ka Cheela
recipe.description: This is an easy breakfast dish.

preparation.li: Put all the ingredients except water in a big bowl.
Now start adding small quantities of water to make a smooth batter, so that there should be no lumps in it.
Add water till it comes to a dropping consistency or just like dosa batter. now keep it aside.
Now heat a non-stick- tawa or heavy bottom frying pan, then turn the heat on medium. put little oil on tawa [1tsp.] and spread 1 serving spoonful of batter evenly on it.
Cover it with lid just for a minute so that it should cook inside also. then remove lid, put some more oil on the top and turn it upside down.
Let it be brown and crispy from both sides.
Repeat the same with rest of the batter.
Serve hot with green chutney or sauce. it can be taken with toast also.

recipe.title: Beetroot Roti
recipe.description: This is an easy breakfast dish.

ingredient.li: Oil/ Ghee – to make the roti

preparation.li: Peel the beetroot and grate it finely. You can also make a puree and proceed.
Take all the ingredients – wheat flour, beetroot and dry spice powders - in a mixing bowl. Adjust the spices as per your taste. If you have a food processor, you can knead the dough easily in that.
Let the dough rest for about 5 minutes.
Take small portion of the dough and make a smooth ball out of it. Roll it out using a rolling pin just like regular rotis.
Cook the rotis on a heated pan. Use some oil or ghee for cooking. cook for 30 seconds on each side
Enjoy hot and healthy beetroot rotis.

recipe.title: Pepper Chicken
recipe.description: This is an easy dish well accompanied with other spicy dishs.

preparation.li: Add in all the spices to a heavy pan and dry roast on a low flame until very fragrant and the pepper starts to pop.Remove from heat and allow it to cool completely.
Grind in the mixie to make a powder. Set aside.
Take a big bowl and add in the chicken pieces. Add in the salt, turmeric powder and the ground masala. Set aside.

Take a pressure cooker and add in the sesame oil. Add in the curry leaves to the oil. Add a layer of onions and a layer of tomatoes. Top it off with the chicken mixture. Add in the thick coconut milk.
Cover and cook for 5 minutes or 5 whistles whichever is earlier.
Switch off the flame and let the cooker rest for 10 minutes. Wait for the pressure from the cooker to release naturally.

Add in some fresh curry leaves and mix well. Heat a pan and transfer the pepper chicken gravy to the pan. Saute on high heat until the gravy becomes thick and the masala gets coated on the chicken. Remove from heat.
Pepper chicken masala is ready.
Serve hot with rice or the south indian parottas.

recipe.title: Coconut and Rice Kheer
recipe.description: A delicious dessert recipe, Coconut and Rice Kheer is made using milk, jaggery, coconut and rice

preparation.li: In a bowl make mixture of boiled milk, rice and shredded coconut.
Now take this mixture on a pan and add jaggery and keep in low flame for 5 min.
After 5 min add raisins, cashews, cardamom and saffron in mixture and mix well.

recipe.title: Caramelized Almonds
recipe.description: Made with sugar and almond, this quick recipe is apt for snacks.

preparation.li: In a pan, dry roast almonds and keep it to cool down so that it becomes crunchy.
In a separate pan, take sugar and let it caramelize then add roasted almonds in it.
Remove on a clean tray and coat it with sesame seeds and salt.
Take a charcoal, burn it on a fire and keep it on bowl, add some rosemary and smoke the almonds which are coated with sesame.

recipe.title: Peach Almond Suji Halwa
recipe.description: A traditional South Indian dessert recipe, Peach Almond Suji Halwa.

preparation.li: Roast the suji in a heavy bottom kadhai for 5 min and reserve in a bowl.
Heat ghee in the pan and add almonds and roast for 2 min.
Now add suji and peach on a pan and mix well for 5 min.

recipe.title: Coconut Barfi
recipe.description: Prepared with grated coconut, sugar, milk and ghee.

preparation.li: To make this delicious barfi recipe, add grated coconut in a microwave safe bowl. Then, add ghee to it and place the bowl into the microwave. Set the heat at high and heat the mixture for 2 minutes. Give the mixture a stir after a minute.

Now take out the bowl from the microwave and pour milk into it. Mix in sugar and sprinkle powdered cardamom. Add yellow edible food color and mix well. Again set the temperature of microwave to high and heat the mixture for 2 minutes. Give the mixture a stir after one minute is over.
Post that, transfer the mixture into a dish. With the help of a ladle, spread the mixture evenly and keep the dish aside. When the mixture is set, cut it into square and serve.

recipe.title: Badam Payasam
recipe.description: Badam Payasam is a traditional South Indian recipe made using milk, almonds and saffron

preparation.li: Blanch the almonds, peel off the skin and grind the almonds to coarse paste by adding ½ cup of milk.
Take remaining milk in a thick bottomed vessel, allow to boil.
Now add sugar, almonds, saffron and pistachios.
Delicious Badam payasam is ready. Serve hot or cold.

recipe.title: Raspberry Coconut Balls
recipe.description: A soft, delectable dessert, Raspberry Coconut Balls is a recipe that will provide you with instant energy

preparation.li: To begin with, wash and clean the raspberries. Once done transfer them into a bowl and crush them using a ladle. Keep them aside until needed again.
Now, take a mixing add rolled oats followed by raspberries, coconut oil, almond flour, raspberries and grated coconuts.
Using a wooden spoon, mix all the ingredients in the bowl until you get a thick consistency.
Now, with clean hands carefully roll the prepared mixture into small balls.

recipe.title: Banana Sheera
recipe.description: This fruity delicious Banana Sheera is one of the simple desserts which is healthy too

ingredient.li: A pinch of powedered green cardamom

preparation.li: For making Banana Sheera, roast semolina in the ghee till its aroma is released.
Bring the milk to a boil, then reduce the heat and add the roasted rawa along with sugar and the bananas.
Blend well, add the raisins and cardamom powder and cook until thick.
Serve hot or cold, as desired with chopped dry fruits.

recipe.title: Badam Ladoo
recipe.description: Badam Laddoo is a very quick and easy-to-make dessert recipe which can be prepared on any festival or special occasion

preparation.li: To prepare these delicious Badam Laddoos, dry roast the chopped almonds in a pan over medium-high flame and keep them aside. Add jaggery in another pan of hot water and dissolve it. Bring it to a boil. After few minutes, strain and simmer the mixture until it starts to thicken.

Add ghee, cardamom powder, raisins and almonds. Stir the ingredients well and remove from the flame. Take portions from the mixture and quickly roll them into small balls using your hands. Place the laddoos on a plate to cool. You can also store these laddoos in a clean jar for later consumption.

recipe.title: Carrot Kheer
recipe.description: This dessert recipe is made using carrot, milk and honey

preparation.li: Put the pan on low-medium heat and saute the carrots in ghee for a few minutes. Then, add sugar and water and cook until the carrots are soft and tender. Add milk and keep it on boil for a few minutes.
Now add your cashew nuts and cardamom and serve it hot.

recipe.title: Semiya
recipe.description: Rice Vermicelli is deliciously simmered with milk-sugar and flavoured with green cardamom, saffron and kewra water

preparation.li: Take deep pan and heat milk over medium flame. Cook milk until it reduces to almost half the original quantity. Meanwhile take a medium pan and heat desi ghee over medium flame.

Add crushed cardamoms in ghee and mix them well. Break rice vermicelli into small pieces and when cardamom starts to crackle, add vermicelli to ghee. Stir for few minutes over low flame. Ensure that sevaiyan doesn't burn.
Cook until vermicelli is slightly brown in colour. Carefully transfer sevaiyan to the milk and leave uncovered on low flame for some time. When they are almost done, add sugar.
Meanwhile soak saffron in condensed milk and keep it aside. Cook sevaiyan for another 10 minutes till it thickens to the appropriate consistency. Mix with a spoon till sugar completely dissolves.
Add kewra essence and soaked saffron in sevaiyan. Remove from flame and let it cool down. When cool, add condensed milk. Lastly, add raisins, dates and almonds. Serve hot or cold.

recipe.title: Rava Upma
recipe.description: Upma is one of the most easiest healthy breakfast and can be done in a jiffy

preparation.li: Dry roast rava until it is hot to touch. If you have got ready made roasted rava, you can skip this step.
Chop onions, ginger and green chillies finely.
Heat 3 tsp of oil, add mustard seeds, when it splutters, add urad dal, red chillies and curry leaves.
When dal turns golden brown, add chopped onions, green chillies and ginger.
Saute until onions turn transparent.
Then add 2 cups of water, ghee and salt needed. Taste the water and check for salt
When the water starts boiling, reduce the flame to low, add rava gradually with one hand and keep stirring with your other hand.
Once the rava absorbs all the water, cover and cook on low flame for 6-7 minutes. Do not forget to stir in between.

recipe.title: Palkova
recipe.description: The perfect quick sweet to prepare using a microwave

ingredient.li: 1/4 cup of roasted nuts of your choice

preparation.li: Pour the condensed milk in a large glass bowl and put in microwave for 1 min.
Now add yogurt in milk and mix well till mixture get little thick.
Add nuts and sugar if you want.

recipe.title: Instant Mango Pickle
recipe.description: This is an easy side dish well accompanied with any rice/curd rice.

preparation.li: wash and cut raw mango into small pieces with skin
Add salt, turmeric powder, fenugreek powder and chili powder to the mango pieces. Mix it very well. Taste the mix and add more spices if needed.
Heat sesame oil in a pan, bring it to smoking point. Add mustard seeds, asafoetida and curry leaves.
When mustard seeds splutter, pour over the mango pieces.
Mix it well with dry spoon. Transfer it to a dry and a clean container. You can serve this immediately but if you rest it for about an hour, it tastes better.

recipe.title: Onion Thokku
recipe.description: This is an easy side dish well accompanied with idli/dosa

preparation.li: Take a pressure cooker (2 or 3 litres capacity only) and add 6 teaspoon of Indian sesame oil.
Add in 250 grams sliced onions.
Add in 8-10 dry red chillies.
Add a small piece of tamarind. About a 1″ coin size. Add in a teaspoon of jaggery. and a teaspoon of sambar powder. Add in a teaspoon of salt.

Set your stove to medium high heat on a gas stove or your induction stove to 1200W. We are going to cook for exactly 5 minutes. Set up a timer in your mobile. Just 5 minutes irrespective of the number of whistles. You might end up getting 5-7 whistles.

Wait for the pressure to release. Open the cooker. If there is a lot of liquid remaining in the cooker, just briefly simmer on high heat for a couple of minutes until the mixture is thick. Ignore this step if the mixture does not have liquid.
Wait for the mixture to cool.
Blend to a paste.
Enjoy your thokku with rice, idli, dosa etc…

recipe.title: Veg Khurma
recipe.description: This is an easy side dish well accompanied with rice/roti.

preparation.li: Grind all the ingredients listed under masala paste to a smooth paste. Add very little water to grind. Maximum upto ½ cup. Set aside.
Take a pressure cooker and add in the oil, ghee and all the spices.
Top it with chopped onions. Spread evenly.
Top it with tomatoes. Spread evenly.
Then comes the vegetables. Spread evenly.
Finally, add in the ground paste as a top layer.
Cover the cooker and cook for 5 minutes on high flame. About 3 whistles.
Switch off the heat and let it rest for 10 minutes.
Open the cooker and add in the milk and coriander leaves.
Mix well to combine.
Serve hot with chapati/parotta

recipe.title: Rava Kesari
recipe.description: This is a dessert which can be served usually after lunch/dinner.
recipe.preparation:
Take a pressure cooker and add in the water, sugar, cardamom powder, turmeric and a pinch of salt. Start the heat and let it simmer.
When the water-sugar mixture is boiling, set a pan on stove in medium heat. Add in the ghee, cashew-nuts and the rava. Keep sauteing all the time so the rava doesnt burn. The rava should start taking the color of a very mild amber. The rava is fully roasted when the cashew nuts have turned slightly golden and the rava has slightly changed colour. Also look for the nutty aroma.
When the sugar mixture comes to a full boil, add in the roasted hot rava into the sugar water mixture. It will bubble up briefly. That’s OK. Switch off the heat / stove.
Immediately after adding rava, mix well once and cover the cooker with the lid and add in the weight. Remember that the stove is off. Do not open the cooker for the next 20 minutes.
Open the cooker after 20 minutes and mix the kesari well. The rava would have absorbed all the moisture and would have swollen up.
Serve the kesari warm.

recipe.title: Coconut Chutney
recipe.description: This is can be served with dosa/idly

ingredient.li: 1/2 fresh whole coconut, drained and grated

preparation.li: Place the coconut and yogurt in a blender or food processor. Process to a paste-like consistency. Transfer to a medium bowl.

Heat the oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Stir in chili peppers, mustard seed, and cumin seeds. Cook until mustard seeds start to pop. Spoon over the coconut mixture. Cover, and refrigerate until serving.

recipe.title: Bendakaya
recipe.description: This is an easy side dish well accompanied with chapati.

ingredient.li: 1 kg bendakaya (bhindi), chopped into small pieces

preparation.li: Heat oil in a wok
Add the onions and green chilies to it and sauté
Once the onions become pink in color, add the ground spices and mix well.
Now add the bendakaya and salt and see that it gets wrapped and mixed nicely with the onions and spices.
Cover the wok and lower the heat just for two minutes.
Take off the heat and fry by stirring on high heat for another 5 minutes and take off the heat.
Serve hot with chapatis

recipe.title: Rava Ladoo
recipe.description: Rava balls

ingredient.li: A handfull of raisins and cashew nuts

preparation.li: Heat the ghee in a pan and add the cashew nuts and raisins.
Now add coconut powder, rava, sugar,milk and mix until the mixture get thick.
When the ladoo mixture is warm enough to handle, make into lemon-sized balls and gently set aside.

recipe.title: Coconut Ladoo
recipe.description: Sweet Coconut balls

preparation.li: Heat the butter and chopped almonds for 2-3 min.
Then add condensed milk and desiccated coconut and mix well.
When the mixture turns quite thick and start to roll into a ball
